description: In ADSP RPC in Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile and Snapdragon Wear, a Use After Free condition can occur in versions MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9650, MSM8909W, MSM8996AU, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 425, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, SDX20.

product.name: Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, Snapdragon Wear
